channel.title: winter on The Outsider's Journey
channel.description: Recent content in winter on The Outsider's Journey

item.title: LOG 4.2: The beginning of the End
item.description: 20th December 2013 Hello everyone, So, it’s been a long silence. Three months and no word. How are you? As some of you may have seen on fb, my first first-author paper got accepted a few weeks ago and published this week.

item.title: LOG 3.6: Five Months
item.description: 8th April 2013 Hi! Yes, it’s been a long time. Nearly 5 months since I last wrote an update email. In November I went to Berlin for my UK visa, and spent whatever hours I was not at work or sleeping on writing a novel.

item.title: LOG 2.6: Solistice
item.description: 23rd December, 2011 Hello ðŸ™‚ It is Winter here but there has been only scanty snowfall which secretly fell in the night and looked like frosty icing in the morning, quickly melting away.

item.title: On a Snowy morning
item.description: When I was 7 and I was about to fly to Australia, I told my grandparents that I will bring some clouds back with me for them.
